words.fact: A product roadmap maps out your product's vision and direction over time. It communicates the why and what behind what you're building to stakeholders.
The product backlog is a prioritized list of work for the development team. Items at the top are detailed and ready to build, while lower items are less defined.
A sprint is a time-boxed period (1-4 weeks) when a team completes a set amount of work. Sprints enable teams to ship incremental value regularly.
Product metrics track and assess product performance. Key metrics include user engagement, retention rate, conversion rate, and customer satisfaction.
